interview.name: User Interviews
interview.description: One-on-one conversations to understand user needs, pains, and goals.
interview.nesta_tip: Don't ask 'Would you use this?' Ask 'When was the last time you solved this problem?' (The Mom Test).

fake_door.name: Fake Door (Smoke Test)
fake_door.description: Create a landing page or button for a feature that doesn't exist yet to measure click-through intent.
fake_door.nesta_tip: Always inform the user afterwards that this was a test and offer to notify them when it launches.

concierge.name: Concierge MVP
concierge.description: Manually performing the service for the user (behind the scenes) instead of building code.
concierge.nesta_tip: Focus on learning the process flows before automating them.

pre_mortem.name: Pre-Mortem
pre_mortem.description: Assume the project has failed 6 months from now. Work backwards to determine what went wrong.
pre_mortem.nesta_tip: This helps break 'groupthink' and allows team members to voice concerns safely.

wizard_of_oz.name: Wizard of Oz
wizard_of_oz.description: The front-end looks real, but humans are doing the work on the back-end.
wizard_of_oz.nesta_tip: Great for testing complex AI or algo-driven ideas without writing the algo.
